title: Really?
body: Riot please. I have to wait 30 minutes to queue because of your servers. I tried to leave queue to only wait 5 but I disconnected from chat meaning I had to join the game. I find it unfair that I keep leaving the champion select and the game still keeps me for the game. Please, I am not happy to get my main account banned because of this bug as I really don't want lose this account. Please sort this out I don't have the time to wait 30 mins because of my schedule so I won't be able to continue my ranked games. I hope you can do something.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: It could be a connection issue on your end. Have you tried looking through the support pages and troubleshooting connection issues?
